October 3, 2017, Justin Gabriel reported directly to Jim

Immediately upon arriving at Renaissance Executive Forums I was able to benefit from the wealth of experience and business acumen that Jim carried with him every day. Even beyond this, I was always empowered by Jim’s positive energy, which absolutely reverberated amongst the organization as a whole.It is far too often that the CEO of an International company would find themselves swept up in the hustle and bustle of their business and quickly become unable to invest valuable time and energy with their employees. This had never been my experience in working with Jim.As a talented leader and a clearly valuable businessman, it’s impossible to give anything but a glowing recommendation for Mr. Jim Canfield.

I have worked with and for Jim Canfield at Renaissance Executive Forums, and I have nothing but praise for his professionalism, his dedication to lifelong learning, and his extremely caring personal demeanor.  Jim has his own great business ideas, yet is also a tremendous collaborator, supportive and willing to build on team members' ideas to achieve results.  He is one of the best presenters I have ever worked with, and brings clarity to even the most dense subject matter.  Jim truly cares about people, and applies the same people-centric approach with team members, our families, colleagues, clients and his friends.  I have already learned a lot from Jim, and continue to do so every day!

Tracy Rickman
Navigating aspiring entrepreneurs through franchise concepts to a successful business suited to their skillset & goals.
August 4, 2010, Tracy was a client of Jim’s

I am pleased to recommend Jim Canfield.  During my 20 years career in technical and consultative sales, I have attended just about every kind of meeting and training you can think of.  There have been sales meetings, blue sky, and open dialog.  On the training side there were just as many which were supposed to increase my ability to sell therefore adding to my revenue numbers.I was invited to join the top performer group of FranNet last year.  Jim is the facilitator of this group.  His style is relaxed but focused.   He has the uncanny ability to understand all of us as individuals while still keeping us a cohesive group.  Leaving these meetings I don’t come back with ‘notes’ on concepts, but rather action items that I can put into place immediately impacting my performance.  Jim’s influence on our group helps us all to improve, see our short comings and know how to address them.  While this is going on, Jim never loses focus the roll our personal life plays in our business performance.  He also assists us with finding the proper balance.If your organization has the opportunity to work with Jim Canfield I highly recommend it.  I know you will see measurable results just like I have.

summary: My focus throughout all that I do centers on supporting and inspiring business leaders who are committed to growth and achievement. As Managing Director of CEO Tools, I’m honored to have been referred to as a “leader of leaders.” My true privilege is the opportunity to provide programs, mentorship and inspired content that helps develop CEOs and management teams, to drive bottom line business results and enhance overall quality of life.I am grateful to have worked with inspiring clients that include small-to-medium size organizations and incredible thought-leaders such as Tony Hsieh from Zappos.com, Chip Conley, author of “Peak,” and founder of JDV Hotels, Marshall Goldsmith, David Allen and more.   My years of coaching and working closely with CEOs and their teams has been extremely rewarding. Time really does fly; as I’ve dedicated over 10,000 hours of coaching and working with more than 300 CEOs. My approach brings a unique blend of extensive experience in leadership theory coupled with practical real-world application, building several companies. Providing clarity and insight into the unique leadership roles and responsibilities of CEOs, business owners, senior executives and managers, I am able to make moving to the next level a reality.In addition to coaching, I enjoy being the keynote speaker or workshop leader for many growth oriented companies such as McDonalds, Culligan Water and more, sharing the messages of CEO Tools, How Companies Grow and Accelerating Change within Organizations. Leading workshops and High-Performance groups for companies like FranNet helped them increase the results of their top performers by more than 100% over 3 years. Specialties: Strategic planning, executive coaching, peak performance coaching, leadership, change management, communications, negotiations, organizational turnaround, business strategies, strategic advisor to CEOs, speaker, and educator.
name: Jim Canfield
title: Managing Director at CEO Tools: Communicate-Execute-Optimize
